text: The Chairman of the Cabinet of Ministers of Kyrgyzstan is the head of government of Kyrgyzstan. Until 2010, the President was in a stronger position than the Prime Minister in Kyrgyzstan. After the 2010 constitutional referendum, the state became a parliamentary system, creating greater power in parliament. This position used to be known as the Prime Minister of Kyrgyzstan. == List of officeholders == No. Picture Name Term of office Term of office Party 1 Nasirdin Isanov (1943–1991) 21 January 1991 29
